main event: The U.S. Coast Guard Cutter 'Eagle' sighted a very bright object moving at high speed from west to east, out of sight in about 10 seconds, in a position 100-135 miles southeast of the Azores.
interesting points: The object was bright enough to shine through the overcast sky.
The object was moving at a high speed.
The sighting lasted for about 10 seconds.
The object was described as a 'very bright' object.
The sighting was reported to various military and intelligence agencies.
